CREATE TABLE <<db2-schema>>.AUTHFRDS                   
(CARD_NUM              CHAR(16)    NOT NULL,
AUTH_TS                TIMESTAMP   NOT NULL,
AUTH_TYPE              CHAR(4)             ,
CARD_EXPI

EXEC SQL UPDATE CARDDEMO.AUTHFRDS SET   AUTH_FRAUD     = :AUTH-FRAUD, FRAUD_RPT_DATE = CURRENT DATE WHERE CARD_NUM = :CARD-NUM AND AUTH_TS  = TIMESTAMP_FORMAT (:AUTH-TS, 'YY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SSNNNNNN') E

CREATE TABLE CARDDEMO.AUTHFRDS
(CARD_NUM              CHAR(16)    NOT NULL,
    AUTH_TS                TIMESTAMP   NOT NULL,
    AUTH_TYPE              CHAR(4)             ,
    CARD_EXPIRY_DATE

Select option '5' to list/update/delete transaction types (CTLI)
   - Browse transaction types using forward/backward paging
   - Update transaction descriptions inline
   - Delete transaction types (
EXEC SQL INSERT INTO CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE ( TR_TYPE, TR_DESCRIPTION ) VALUES ( :INPUT-REC-NUMBER, :INPUT-REC-DESC ) END-EXEC.
EXEC SQL UPDATE CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE SET TR_DESCRIPTION = :INPUT-REC-DESC WHERE TR_TYPE = :INPUT-REC-NUMBER END-EXEC
EXEC SQL DELETE FROM CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE WHERE TR_TYPE = :INPUT-REC-NUMBER END-EXEC.

EXEC SQL DECLARE C-TR-TYPE-FORWARD CURSOR FOR SELECT TR_TYPE ,TR_DESCRIPTION FROM  CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE WHERE TR_TYPE >= :WS-START-KEY AND  ((:WS-EDIT-TYPE-FLAG = '1' AND   TR_TYPE = :WS-TYPE-CD-

EXEC SQL DECLARE C-TR-TYPE-BACKWARD CURSOR FOR SELECT TR_TYPE ,TR_DESCRIPTION FROM  CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE WHERE TR_TYPE < :WS-START-KEY and  ((:WS-EDIT-TYPE-FLAG = '1' and   TR_TYPE = :WS-TYPE-CD-
EXEC SQL FETCH C-TR-TYPE-FORWARD INTO :DCL-TR-TYPE ,:DCL-TR-DESCRIPTION END-EXEC
EXEC SQL FETCH C-TR-TYPE-FORWARD INTO :DCL-TR-TYPE ,:DCL-TR-DESCRIPTION END-EXEC
EXEC SQL FETCH C-TR-TYPE-BACKWARD INTO :DCL-TR-TYPE ,:DCL-TR-DESCRIPTION END-EXEC

EXEC SQL SELECT COUNT(1) INTO :WS-RECORDS-COUNT FROM CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE WHERE ((:WS-EDIT-TYPE-FLAG = '1' AND  TR_TYPE = :WS-TYPE-CD-FILTER) OR  :WS-EDIT-TYPE-FLAG <> '1') AND ((:WS-EDIT-DESC-FL
EXEC SQL UPDATE CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE SET TR_DESCRIPTION = :DCL-TR-DESCRIPTION WHERE TR_TYPE = :DCL-TR-TYPE END-EXEC
EXEC SQL DELETE FROM CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE WHERE TR_TYPE = :DCL-TR-TYPE END-EXEC

EXEC SQL INCLUDE DCLTRCAT END-EXEC  ****************************************************************** *Application Commmarea Copybook COPY COCOM01Y.  01 WS-THIS-PROGCOMMAREA. 05 TTUP-UPDATE-SCREEN-DA
EXEC SQL SELECT TR_TYPE ,TR_DESCRIPTION INTO :DCL-TR-TYPE ,:DCL-TR-DESCRIPTION FROM CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE WHERE TR_TYPE = :DCL-TR-TYPE END-EXEC
EXEC SQL UPDATE CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE SET TR_DESCRIPTION = :DCL-TR-DESCRIPTION WHERE TR_TYPE = :DCL-TR-TYPE END-EXEC
EXEC SQL INSERT INTO CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE (TR_TYPE, TR_DESCRIPTION) VALUES ( :DCL-TR-TYPE ,:DCL-TR-DESCRIPTION) END-EXEC
EXEC SQL DELETE FROM CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE WHERE TR_TYPE = :DCL-TR-TYPE END-EXEC
EXEC SQL SELECT 1 INTO :WS-DUMMY-DB2-INT FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY END-EXEC

CREATE TABLE  CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE
       (       TR_TYPE   CHAR(2)      NOT NULL,
        TR_DESCRIPTION   VARCHAR(50)  NOT NULL,
                 PRIMARY KEY(TR_TYPE))
         IN CARDDEMO.CARD

CREATE TABLE CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE_CATEGORY
       (TRC_TYPE_CODE     CHAR(2)        NOT NULL,
        TRC_TYPE_CATEGORY CHAR(4)        NOT NULL,
        TRC_CAT_DATA      VARCHAR(50)    NOT NULL,

ALTER TABLE CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE_CATEGORY
    FOREIGN KEY (TRC_TYPE_CODE)
      REFERENCES CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE (TR_TYPE)
  ON DELETE RESTRICT;

INSERT INTO CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE_CATEGORY
      (TRC_TYPE_CODE    ,
       TRC_TYPE_CATEGORY,
       TRC_CAT_DATA     )
 WITH DMY AS (SELECT * FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1)
 SELECT '01','0001','REGULAR

INSERT INTO CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE
        (TR_TYPE,TR_DESCRIPTION)
 SELECT '01','PURCHASE'      FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 UNION ALL

CREATE TABLE CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE_CATEGORY
(   TRC_TYPE_CODE                  CHAR(2) NOT NULL,
    TRC_TYPE_CATEGORY              CHAR(4) NOT NULL,
    TRC_CAT_DATA                   VARCHAR(50)

CREATE TABLE CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE
(   TR_TYPE                        CHAR(2) NOT NULL,
    TR_DESCRIPTION                 VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY(TR_TYPE));

SELECT CAST(CONCAT(CONCAT(
   TR_TYPE
  ,CAST(TR_DESCRIPTION AS CHAR(50))
   )
  ,REPEAT('0',8)
 ) AS CHAR(60))
  FROM

SELECT CAST(
        TRC_TYPE_CODE
     || TRC_TYPE_CATEGORY
     || CAST(TRC_CAT_DATA AS CHAR(50))
     || REPEAT('0',4)
                      AS CHAR(60))
  FROM
